foreignData.name: Höllischer Nachtschrat
foreignData.text: Wenn der Höllische Nachtschrat angreift und nicht geblockt wird, bestimmt Dein Gegner eine Karte aus seiner Hand und wirft diese ab

mainBoard.name: Abyssal Nightstalker
mainBoard.originalText: If Abyssal Nightstalker attacks and isn't blocked, your opponent chooses and discards a card from his or her hand. (Ignore this effect if your opponent doesn't have any cards.)

rulings.text: An ability that triggers when something "attacks and isn't blocked" triggers in the declare blockers step after blockers are declared if (1) that creature is attacking and (2) no creatures are declared to block it. It will trigger even if that creature was put onto the battlefield attacking rather than having been declared as an attacker in the declare attackers step.

mainBoard.text: Whenever this creature attacks and isn't blocked, defending player discards a card.

foreignData.name: Brutaler Nachtschrat
foreignData.text: Wenn der Brutale Nachtschrat aus Deiner Hand ins Spiel kommt, kannst Du einen Gegner zwingen, eine Karte aus seiner Hand zu bestimmen und diese abzuwerfen.

mainBoard.name: Brutal Nightstalker
mainBoard.originalText: When Brutal Nightstalker comes into play from your hand, you may force your opponent to choose and discard a card from his or her hand.
mainBoard.text: When this creature enters, you may have target opponent discard a card.

mainBoard.flavorText: The bat thrives on what underestimates it.

foreignData.name: ダクムーアのコウモリ

mainBoard.name: Dakmor Bat

foreignData.name: Lauernder Nachtschrat
foreignData.text: Wenn der lauernde Nachtschrat angreift, erhält er +2/+0 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

mainBoard.name: Lurking Nightstalker
mainBoard.originalText: If Lurking Nightstalker attacks, it gets +2/+0 until the end of the turn.
mainBoard.text: Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

mainBoard.flavorText: Part metal, part bone, and all death.

foreignData.name: Nachtschratlaufwerk
foreignData.text: Die Stärke des Nachtschratlaufwerks ist gleich der Anzahl an Kreaturenkarten auf Deinem Friedhof.

mainBoard.name: Nightstalker Engine
mainBoard.originalText: Nightstalker Engine has power equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
mainBoard.text: Nightstalker Engine's power is equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

foreignData.name: Beutelauernder Nachtschrat
foreignData.text: Wenn der Beutlauernde Nachtschrat aus Deiner Hand ins Spiel kommt, kannst Du einen Gegner zwingen, eine seiner Kreaturen zu zerstören

mainBoard.name: Predatory Nightstalker
mainBoard.originalText: When Predatory Nightstalker comes into play from your hand, you may force your opponent to destroy any one of his or her creatures. (Your opponent chooses the creature.)
mainBoard.text: When this creature enters, you may have target opponent sacrifice a creature of their choice.

mainBoard.flavorText: Silent as a serpent, twisted as a lone bog tree, evil as Tojira's heart.

foreignData.name: Schleichender Nachtschrat
foreignData.text: Der Schleichende Nachtschrat kann nur von schwarzen Kreaturen geblockt werden.

mainBoard.name: Prowling Nightstalker
mainBoard.originalText: Prowling Nightstalker can't be blocked except by other black creatures.
mainBoard.text: This creature can't be blocked except by black creatures.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Our steeds need food, water, stabling. Theirs just need prey."
—Restela, Alaborn marshal
mainBoard.name: Raiding Nightstalker
mainBoard.originalText: Swampwalk (If defending player has any swamps in play, Raiding Nightstalker can't be blocked.)
mainBoard.text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

mainBoard.name: Ancient Craving
mainBoard.text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Such a fragile organ, the brain."
—Tojira, swamp queen

foreignData.name: Grausames Edikt
foreignData.text: Dein Gegner bestimmt eine seiner Kreaturen. Zerstöre diese Kreatur.

mainBoard.name: Cruel Edict
mainBoard.originalText: Your opponent chooses one of his or her creatures. Destroy that creature.
mainBoard.text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature of their choice.

mainBoard.flavorText: The touch of death is never gentle.

foreignData.name: Todbringende Hand
foreignData.text: Zerstöre eine Kreatur, die nicht schwarz ist.

mainBoard.name: Hand of Death
mainBoard.originalText: Destroy any one creature that isn't black.

foreignData.name: Gedankenzersetzung
foreignData.text: Dein Gegner bestimmt zwei Karten aus seiner Hand und wirft diese ab (wenn Dein Gegner nur eine Karte auf der Hand hat, wirft er diese ab).

mainBoard.name: Mind Rot
mainBoard.originalText: Your opponent chooses and discards two cards from his or her hand. (If your opponent has only one card, he or she discards it.)

foreignData.name: Rückkehr der Nachtschrate
foreignData.text: Bringe alle Nachtschratkarten aus Deinem Friedhof direkt ins Spiel. Zerstöre dann alle Deine Sümpfe (behandle diese Nachtschrate, als ob Du sie gerade von Deiner Hand gesprochen hättest).

mainBoard.name: Return of the Nightstalkers
mainBoard.originalText: Return all the Nightstalker cards from your graveyard to play. Then destroy all your swamps. (Treat these Nightstalkers as though they just came into play from your hand.)
mainBoard.text: Return all Nightstalker permanent cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. Then destroy all Swamps you control.
